document_data.caption: Ephelomon and [[Vlaakith I]].
document_data.name: Ephelomon
document_data.mainbody:
'''Ephelomon''' was a [[Red dragon|red]] [[great wyrm]] consort of the Queen of Dragons, [[Tiamat]], and later a consort of the Lich-Queen, [[Vlaakith I]].{{Cite dungeon/100/The Lich-Queen's Beloved|135}}{{Cite dungeon/168/A Tyranny of Souls|45}}{{Cite polyhedron/159/Incursion: Knights of the Lich-Queen|7}}
{{Quote|Go forth and conquer them all.|Ephelomon to Vlaakith I.{{Cite dragon/309/Incursion: A World Under Siege|81}}}}
